headline: Dave Ramsey Slams People Dreaming About The 1950s Ford Factory Worker Owning A Nice House, Says It Wasn't The Dream People Think It Was
summary: Personal finance expert Dave Ramsey has a message for people nostalgic about the “good old days” of American homeownership: you’re looking at the past through rose-colored glasses. That 1957 Dream Home Wasn’t What You Think In a recent episode of “The Ramsey Show,” Ramsey pushed back against a viral Instagram post that claimed a Ford Motor factory worker in the 1950s could afford a house, a car, and a stay-at-home wife on a single income. “I’m looking at the house.
